front.title: A Profile for AS Adjacency Attestation Objects

abstract.t: This document defines a standard profile for AS Adjacency Attestation Objects (AAOs). An AAO is a digitally signed object that provides a means of verifying that an AS has made an attestation that it has a inter-domain routing adjacency with one or more other AS's, with the associated inference that this AS may announce or receive routes with these adjacent AS's.
